REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0599 reute r f BC-FFB-<FFCT>-SETS-INITI 03-05 0048

TEXT.TITLE: FFB <FFCT> SETS INITIAL QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: FFB Corp, parent of the First Federal Bank of Connecticut FSB, said it declared an initial quarterly dividend of five cts per share. The company said the dividend is payable March 31 to holders of record March 17. Reuter
